title: Test File Storage for free!
description: Need shared storage for clusters or instances? Our fully managed File Storage for Public Cloud delivers NFS volumes from 150 GiB to 10 TiB, up to 16 000 IOPS and 128 MB/s. Compatible with Managed Kubernetes (RWX PVCs) and Public Cloud Instances (NFS mounts), share files seamlessly across nodes, zones, and apps with transparent pricing.

learn-more.title: Learn more
learn-more.description: Labs page explaining the feature set and billing of File Storage.

get-started.title: Get started
get-started.description: A step-by-step documentation to help you to create your first share.

discord.title: Stay informed
discord.description: Join us to directly on #beta-file-storage: ask your questions and share your feedback.
